title: 21A handed over to Maha Sangha
body_lines: Picture shows the 21st amendment to the constitution is being handed over to the Dodampahala Sri Chandrasiri Thera and to the general secretary of the Sri Lanka Amarapura Maha Sangha Sabhawa Ven. Prof. Pallekande Rathanasara Thera by the Justice, Prison Affairs and Constitutional Reforms Minister (Dr.) Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
